snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s campaign rejected a Fox News offer and said her priority was addressing “the threat a Donald Trump presidency poses.”
abstract: Hillary Clinton spurns invitation to debate Sen Bernie Sanders before California primary; Clinton campaign asserts candidate is focusing on confronting Donald J Trump, her likely opponent in general election.

byline.contributor: Amy Chozick contributed reporting from New York, and Yamiche Alcindor from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s campaign rejected a Fox News offer and said her priority was addressing “the threat a Donald Trump presidency poses.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Declines Invitation to Debate Bernie Sanders
headline.print_headline: Clinton Declines Offer to Debate Sanders
